translations: v．畏缩，退缩：因害怕、尴尬或不舒服而身体或面部表情出现紧张、不自然的状态。
· He cringes every time he hears his own voice on tape.
每次听到自己在录音带上的声音，他都会感到不自在。

sentences.sentence: He always cringes before the boss.
sentences.translation: 他在老板面前总是卑躬屈膝。

sentences.sentence: They sense and mimic peers' behavior from early on, too, looking up at the ceiling if others around them do so or mirroring others' cringes of fear and anxiety.
sentences.translation: 他们的这种模仿的意识和行为从很早就开始了(当周围的人都看着天花板是他也抬头仰望，或者在害怕和焦虑时像别人一样畏缩)。
